name: Rainbow - BBQ Hot sauce
description: A medium spicy BBQ hot sauce from Rainbow. Perfect balance of flavor and heat.

name: Seed Ranch - Umami Reserve
description: Seed Ranch's Umami Reserve offers a rich, savory flavor with a hot kick.

name: SWET - Sun Burn
description: SWET's Sun Burn sauce brings a hot, sun-kissed flavor to your dishes.

name: SWET - FUMATA
description: Experience the intense heat of SWET's FUMATA. Not for the faint-hearted!

name: KARMA - Ghost Island
description: KARMA's Ghost Island sauce is hauntingly hot, a thrill for spice lovers.

name: KARMA - Funken Hot
description: KARMA's Funken Hot sauce is a fiery delight, sure to ignite your taste buds.

name: Pain is Good - Habanero
description: Pain is Good's Habanero sauce is a spicy challenge, delivering a potent punch.

name: KARMA - Scorpio Disco
description: KARMA's Scorpio Disco is a hot dance of flavors, a true test for spice enthusiasts.

name: Tubby Toms's - Honey Butter
description: Tubby Tom's Honey Butter sauce is a mild, sweet treat for your palate.

name: Bravado - Creamy Herb
